entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. And honestly, your website is a NIGHTMARE to navigate.
I apologize for the trouble with our website. I'm happy to help. Can you tell me what you'd like to return?
It's a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little over two weeks ago, and it's just not working out for me. The heart rate monitor is wildly inaccurate, and I need something reliable.

I understand. I'm sorry to hear you're having issues with the VeloBand Pulse. To confirm, you're within our return policy window. Our standard policy is 90 days for returns with proof of purchase. Do you have your order number handy?

Ninety days? Really? I thought it was much shorter than that! Okay, great. Yeah, hold on... it's... #VF789234. I really need this sorted quickly; I've already bought another smart watch from someone else.

Thank you. Let me pull up your order... Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse here. Since you are within our 90 days return policy, I can process a return for you right away. You’ll receive a full refund to your original payment method within 7-10 business days.
Seriously? That's fantastic! I was expecting a huge hassle. Are you sure there aren't any hidden fees or restocking charges? The last company I dealt with tried to pull that stunt on me.

No hidden fees at all. I've processed the return. You'll receive an email with instructions on how to ship the VeloBand Pulse back to us. Just follow those instructions carefully, and you'll be all set. If you have any problems, feel free to call us back. Should I connect you with a manager?
No, that's not necessary. This is great! I was dreading this call, but you've made it so easy. Thank you so much!
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business, and we're glad we could help. Have a great day!
